comment.author: 7357861@N03
comment._content: Hey, just want to say thank you for making excellent photos like this available. As an Extension forester, I use this photo in talks about Extension and the land grant university system like this one, delivered in March 2011 to a visiting group of Chinese forestry professionals. -eli
